channel.title: Games/Consoles Discussion
channel.description:
Use this thread to discuss games and consoles. I will try to keep this main post updated with links to different game discussions in this thread.
Include - Game Name and/or Console, Discussion Question/Comment
Posts -
[ul][li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,455976.msg3338187.html#msg3338187]PS3 'Wii Remote'[/url][/li] [li][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,455976.msg3338798.html#msg3338798]The next XBox[/url][/li][/ul]

item.title: Games/Consoles Discussion
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

The next xbox, I hear its pretty amazing. No flaws apparently. (It has the best Wi-Fi available, insides are reworked, built in fan, 2x as small, cooler colors, 250GB Hard Drive)

Read full topic

item.title: Games/Consoles Discussion
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:2, topic:359525”]The new PS3 with the ‘wii’ remote looks pretty awesome. I think they can make the wii obsolete with this update.[/quote]Yea, that looks pretty cool. All it means is that the PS3 is a few years behind though, and Nintendo will just have to make something better. But the Wii is already in so many homes, I doubt it will become obsolete quickly.

Read full topic
